turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Hi, am I speaking with Marcus Chen?

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: Yeah, that's me. What's this about?

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Thanks Marcus. I'm calling from Example Finance. Just need to confirm a couple of details before we continue. Can you confirm your date of birth?

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: And can you confirm the postcode on your account?

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: 3000. But look, if this is about that account again, I already paid it off. Months ago.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: I understand. I'm calling about an outstanding balance of $892.40. You're saying you've already paid this?

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: Yes! I paid it in September. I have the bank statement right here. Reference number and everything. This is the third time I've had to explain this.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: I'm really sorry you've had to go through that. Let me log this as a formal dispute and we'll investigate it properly. Can you give me the payment reference from your bank statement?

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: It's... hold on... EXF-PAY-2024-09-15-4827. Paid on the 15th of September. $892.40 exactly.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Thank you. I've noted the reference EXF-PAY-2024-09-15-4827, payment date 15 September, amount $892.40. I'm raising a formal dispute on your account now. While this is being investigated, we'll pause all collection activity.

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: Good. Because I'm not paying twice. And I want something in writing confirming the dispute.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Absolutely. I'll send you an email confirmation with the dispute reference number. What email should I use?

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Got it. The dispute will be investigated within 10 business days. You'll receive a letter with the outcome. In the meantime, you won't receive any further collection calls about this amount.

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: Finally. Someone who actually listens. Thank you.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: No problem, Marcus. I apologise for the frustration this has caused. Is there anything else I can help with today?

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: No, that's it. Just get it sorted.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Will do. You'll have that email confirmation within the hour. Take care.
